overview: Michael Sawtell, founder and former chief executive officer of DigitalPost Interactive, Inc. and his team launched The Family Post, Inc. on December 19, 2005. The company is well-acclaimed for its flagship Web 2.0 property TheFamilyPost.com, which won several accolades as the best digital media sharing platform.

web_presences.title: Further information on DigitalPost Interactive, Inc., a web development company founded by Michael Sawtell, is available here.
